go_data.justification: Mild osmotic stress is thought to induce elevated cellular levels of ACC, which could activate MPK3/MPK6.
The transcriptional activity of ERF6 in Arabidopsis is regulated by MPK3/MPK6 in response to biotic and abiotic stress.
The transcriptional activity of ERF6 in Arabidopsis is regulated by MPK3/MPK6 in response to biotic and abiotic stress.
MPK3/MPK6-mediated phosphorylation stabilizes ERF6 and enables its targeting to the nucleus, implying MPK3/MPK6 is located in the cytoplasm where it can interact with ERF6.
